content:
Since hapi 5.0.0 i can't use run-server in the hapi cli. At Startup a stacktrace appears, complaining about a missing Bean PartitionSettings .
See also: https://groups.google.com/g/hapi-fhir/c/Xwu91i7C0Uw/m/HO_5zUKlBwAJ?pli=1
Am i the only person having this problem? The Google Group post also suggests that the cli build is not working.
the cli user group is apparently not that big :( - Ain't @James Agnew the only one that can release it in the fixed versions?
